results.title: Ombre baby quilt
results.description:
Ombre baby quilt,pastel colours,tummy time mat,small baby blanket,baby shower gift,wallhanging,crib cot blanket,changing mat,nursery decor

This beautiful and timeless modern ombre letters fabric from Art Gallery fabric's Capsule Collection is so versatile. 

This could be a baby tummy time mat - perfect for when you need or want to put your precious bundle down on the floor, grass or beach safely and comfortably. 

It is equally at home being used as a crib quilt and later as wall decor for the nursery...or I can make you two so it can be both at same time!

Fabulous modern pastel colours on a creamy white background which I free motion quilted with  matching creamy thread. It has a light wadding in the middle to give it more body.

It can have a hanging sleeve sewn on the back and you can easily buy a bamboo cane to go through it or some thin driftwood. 

This would look lovely in a modern nursery (could even be a tummy time mate and then later hung on the wall) or living room alike ...or anywhere you want to see this message......LOVE LIVE LAUGH!!! 

Perfect for your Valentine,to show your love for someone, for a baby shower or your Mum!

There are other matching and co-ordinating items in my shop too! 

I can also be commissioned to make whatever you like with this fabric.

ALL MY QUILTS ARE DESIGNED TO BE STURDY AND WITHSTAND WHATEVER BABY CAN 'THROW' AT IT AND BE WASHED ON 30C IN THE WASHING MACHINE THEN PREFERABLY HUNG TO DRY ALTHOUGH A LIGHT DRYING CYCLE IS FINE TOO

results.title: Seize the Day Quotes - Box of 50 Handmade Quotations
results.description:
‘Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it.  Boldness has genius, magic and power in it.’ - Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

‘This is a wonderful day.  I’ve never seen this one before.’ – Maya Angelou

‘How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.’ – Anne Frank
 
This set contains 50 quotations from a variety of sources, all focused on seizing the day, truly embracing life.  I hope you find them as inspiring as I do.  The quotations are all handmade and cut in ivory card, and presented in a 9.5 x 9.5cm (approx. 3.5 x 3.5 inches) card box, decorated by hand with beautiful ribbon.  Each box tag on the set is hand finished in copper foil lettering to give it an extra special look.

If you have any queries at all, or any ideas for quotation cards of your own, please feel free to send me a message.

Please check out my policies before you purchase:
https://www.etsy.com/uk/shop/MyMumAndMeQuotes/policy
and if you have any other questions don't hesitate to ask.

and here is the rest of my shop:
MyMumAndMeQuotes.etsy.com

results.title: Live Love Wine-Lighted Wine Bottle-Gift-Home Decor
results.description:
Live Love Wine-Lighted Wine Bottle-Gift-Home Decor

Clear or amber glass, 750 ml wine bottle, frosted with battery operated cork light strand. Light strand is approximately 7.2' with 20 LED soft white or bright white lights attached to cork containing 3 LR44 batteries (included).   Vinyl lettering is available in an assortment of colors. Any and all paints used are water-based and nontoxic. 
 
My bottles make great gifts for family, friends and coworkers.  Since they are battery operated, they can be placed anywhere.  They are beautiful and make wonderful additions to any home/holiday decor no matter if the lights are turned on or off.

I make all bottles to order so if you would like to make changes and/or add personalized information, please specify in the personalization section.  Additionally, any bottle can come with floral at the neck of the bottle.  Floral is not permanently attached and can be removed.

Would you like a custom bottle(s) for a special occasion? Please start a conversation with me or email me at thewinebottlelady@gmail.com.

results.title: Live well, Laugh often, Love much in Gaelic
results.description:
This piece is approximately 48” wide x 6” tall and is painted on naturally aged pine. The phrase is "Live well, Laugh Often, Love Much" in Gaelic. This piece would make the perfect gift for someone you love, or for you! If you would like any customization, please send me a note with your thoughts!

All 139handcrafted items are constructed and hand painted/hand lettered by me, Katie Bartel. I enjoy creating one-of-a-kind pieces using naturally aged pine wood from our local mill, or authentic, 100+ year old reclaimed wood that we have recovered from local barns that have been torn down. What makes these pieces unique is the natural beauty and texture of the aged wood contrasting with crisp lettering and imagery that is hand painted on them. No stencils, vinyl or appliqués are used….just a brush and paint! Because of this, I am able to work with you to customize any piece. Occasionally I am able to find the perfect antique tin, pot, or piece to create something totally unique! 

You’ll see some examples of those in my Gallery on my website here: http://139handcrafted.com/
 
See my other pieces here: https://www.etsy.com/shop/139handcrafted?ref=hdr_shop_menu

Or find out more of the story behind some of my pieces by visiting my website and blog here: http://139handcrafted.com/ and http://139handcrafted.com/blog/

And always, if you have an idea but don't see exactly what you want, send me a message!

results.title: live laugh love wood sign, above doorway signs, wood burning art by hand, wedding gift for couples, 5th anniversary gift, housewarming gift
results.description:
This handmade wood sign is made with birch wood. 
The entire process from cut to sealer has been all done by hand.
The wood burning process is done by hand with 
a wood burning tool, not with a laser machine.

This wall mounted sign says:

Live every moment
laugh every day
love beyond words

Its a unique gift for that hard to buy for person. 
A gift for a husband or wife for the 5th anniversary, as wood is the 5 year gift,
A housewarming gift for a couple moving into a new home,
A Christmas gift for your loved one, or just an everyday gift.

You can choose to ship our products directly to your gift recipient.
If items are marked as gifts we can include a handwritten note
with your message free of charge.

Made with Birch Wood
Measures 4x11x1/2 
Routed edges
Stained in walnut
Sealed with a gloss urethane
Keyhole hanger on back
Signed & Dated by artist.

Other Stain Options Available (See Pics for Options)
All Finishes Will Receive Urethane Sealer Unless Design Doesn't Allow It. (Shading etc.)

*These are made to order*

We're happy to create custom products. If you'd like something different
please feel free to reach out.

Check out our other great handmade products available here on Etsy 
 @ Www.Etsy.com/shop/TimeToBurnArt 

Or check out upcoming pieces in progress
 @ Www.Facebook.com/StephCreatesArt/


***Message me for bundle pricing.***
**Shipping discounts available for multiple item purchases.**

Due to the natural beauty of the wood, there may be flaws such as knots, dark grain, light grain, small chips or nicks from cutting tools used. 

Please Note: The picture is a sample of what you will receive. I do my best to replicate each piece so they are close to the same, but no two pieces are identical. Each piece is One of a kind.

**Shipping time of 1 to 2 weeks is an estimate. Most made to order items can be ready to ship in 2 to 3 business days depending on quantity of orders ahead of yours and the item you purchase. Message me if you need it by a certain date and i can let you know if its possible.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Jewelry Set, Strawberry Pink Jewelry Set, Strawberry Quartz Jewelry Set, Natural Stone Jewelry Set, Teardrop Jewelry Set
results.description:
This live laugh love jewelry set is beautiful and one of a kind.

The natural stone necklace features a large (7/8 in. in length), faceted, strawberry quartz bead in a teardrop shape.  It is a medium, warm pink in color with natural markings.  I accented the teardrop bead with decorative, plated silver bead caps and silver, hematite beads.  This pink stone hangs beneath a long (1.5 in.), plated silver charm with the stamped words "live, love, laugh".  The charm is further accented by a stack of silver, hematite stone beads.  I finished this strawberry quartz necklace with a plated silver chain and lobster clasp.

Length:  18 in.; pendant hangs just over 3.5 in. below
See the 6th photo for scale.

The matching earrings feature large (7/8 in. in length), faceted, strawberry quartz beads in a teardrop shape.  They are a medium, warm pink in color with natural markings.  I accented the teardrop beads with decorative, plated silver bead caps and silver, hematite beads.  I finished these pink earrings with plated silver, lever back ear wires.

Length: just under 2 in.
See the 7th photo for scale.

*YOU SAVE 20% BY PURCHASING THE SET!

Each item is also available individually in my shop:

Necklace:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/706570572/live-laugh-love-necklace-strawberry-pink?ref=shop_home_active_1&frs=1

https://www.etsy.com/listing/706567800/strawberry-pink-earrings-plated-silver?ref=shop_home_active_1&frs=1

earthlybaubles.etsy.com

results.title: Live Love Laugh Butterfly Vinyl Decal Sticker Wine Bottle Vase
results.description:
This is a listing for 1 x Live Love Laugh Vinyl Decal Sticker in colour of your choice
(Please select from drop down option)

You will receive:
1x Vinyl decal total approx size 15cm high x 9cm wide.

Please Note 
*There is no background colour to this item so the background colour will be whatever you apply it to.
*Please note the the reverse option means that the image will be printed to place on the inside of the glass so shows through the glass the correct way around*

To apply:
1. Ensure surface is smooth, clean and oil free
2. Peel back the clear plastic, leaving the decal attached
3. Line up decal onto surface and rub firmly
4. Peel way the clear plastic to leave the decal on surface

(Sometimes decal may not fully lift off the backing paper. If this happens you will need to rub with a credit card over the top of the clear plastic firmly until the decal sticks to the surface)

Free P&P Standard 2nd class (unless chosen upgrade postage option) within 2 working days of fund received 
 
Check out my other items! Be sure to add me to your favorites list!

results.title: Primitive wood sign,  country sign for home,  Live Simple, Laugh Often, Love Much sign, wood sign with quotes, solid wood signs
results.description:
Live Simple, Laugh Often, Love Much sign. This sign is hand made to order just for you! Hand stenciled then sanded and distressed with an antique finish. Each sign is unique with minor imperfections that add to the primitive feel of the sign. This sign is made from solid wood. The sign has a sawtooth hanger and is easily hung. Great for a protected area outside the door or in a breezeway as well. This sign is painted a nice sage green with red lettering with stars painted brown. Please contact us for other color options.

Height: 4 1/2 Inches; Width: 30 Inches; Depth: 3/4 Inches

Each sign is handcrafted and made to order just for you in 3-5 days. If you need it sooner, please contact us and we may be able to accommodate a special request.  Free shipping to the lower 48 states only, we do not ship to Hawaii or Alaska.

Please contact us with any questions or special requests.  

Thanks for visiting our shop!


Visit us on social media:

Instagram: #jcfamilywoodworking
Pinterest: pinterest.com/jcfamilywoodworking

results.description:

Our Key Hanger is a fashionable way to keep every key in its place or keep jewelry organized and untangled. The image is a DIGITAL IMAGE DYED INTO THE BOARD with a glossy finish. Each hanger comes with four hooks and pre-punched holes for the key hooks. Also included is a wall mounting template for easy mounting and 2 screws.
 
*******PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS IS NOT A STICKER ON THE FRONT OF THE BOARD OR VINYL. THE IMAGE YOU SEE IS A DIGITAL IMAGED DYED DIRECTLY INTO THE MDF KEY HANGER******

 New 5”x11” Hanger Made Of MDF

Select Quantity

results.title: Soy Candle︱Live Laugh Love ︱Don’t Be A Cunt
results.description:
Welcome to She Said It Candle Co- because somebody has to say it.

All of our candles are hand poured with love in Kelowna, B.C, Canada.  We use 100% American soy bean wax, lead free wicks and scents so good they'll have you screaming for more.
We design our labels for the things that need to be said all infused with a little bit of sass, sarcasm, wit and 'badassery'.  Follow our Instagram to keep up to date on our most recent designs @shesaiditcandleco


Scents:


Creamy Cinnamon Chai: 
This fragrance oil has layer after layer of enticement, starting with savory nutmeg and Chai unfolding into a heart of true cinnamon stick.  A rich, creamy and sensual vanilla base finishes this scent off. 



Midnight Jasmine:
Ever walk under the stars in the spring smelling the flowers in the air?  That’s what this scent is.  It’s seductive and sweet with the true smell of calming jasmine.



Cherry Blossom:
This fragrance screams Spring from the top of the mountains.  A rich combination of Plum, Pear, Jasmine, Cherry Blossom and Lily with subtle base notes of Cedarwood and Vanilla. 



Black Raspberry:
It’s like eating vanilla ice cream on the porch.  Ripe black raspberries mixed with dark plum and warm vanilla sugar. 




Lilac in Bloom:
A true lilac scent filling the room with fresh flowers.  Subtle notes of rose nad lily accentuate this floral scent. 



Ocean Coast:
A more masculine scent reminiscent of A coastal storm of sea salt air, ocean spray, misted cypress and sun bleached driftwood. 



Alpine Frost:
Crisp winter air, cypress trees, frosted woods, oakmoss, and fresh spices. Reminiscent of a walk in the woods on a snowy December day.

results.title: Mom Shirt, #momlife, Mom Life, Mother’s Day Tshirt, Mother’s Day Gift, Gift for Mom, Mother Tshirt, Supermom, Birthday, Proud Mom Tee
results.description:
Perfect gift for to show your appreciation for Mom on Mother’s Day, or any other day, really! She did give you life after all!
Your typical 100% cotton t-shirt (except for Heather Blue color that contain polyester). Pre-shrunk to make sure your size is maintained throughout several washes, and a classic fit.

• 100% combed ringspun cotton 
• Heather Blue is 35% combed ringspun cotton and 65% polyester
• Fabric weight: 4.3 oz/yd² (145.8 g/m²)
• 30 singles
• Classic semi-contoured silhouette with side seam
• Tear-away label
• Shoulder-to-shoulder taping
• Seamed collarette
• Double-needle stitched sleeves and bottom hem

***Get your matching #momlife mug here! —> https://etsy.me/3kSUT3V 

Thanks for looking!

results.title: Live Laugh Love wall decal, inspiring living room wall phrase, cute vinyl sticker quote with butterflies, uplifting home decor lettering
results.description:
Live, Laugh, Love vinyl wall decal phrase with butterfly graphics.

*************************************************
DESCRIPTION

**YOU ARE ONLY BUYING THE DECAL IN THE PHOTO** You will receive ONE (1) decal per purchase.

Please note that certain paint types and finishes contain additives that will not allow vinyl to stick. Some examples are silicone based, low/no VOC's and easy clean. It is always best to check adhesion with a test decal if you are unsure. Please allow fresh paint to cure ONE month before applying decals. Use caution when installing or removing decals on painted surfaces so no damage is done to the finish.

*************************************************
MATERIAL

Our decals are created using a quality, name brand vinyl. They can be applied to most flat or slightly curved, smooth surfaces and are removable BUT NOT RE-USABLE. They can not be re-positioned or relocated.

All decals we make have the adhesive on the back of the material NOT the top or face (example: If going on a vehicle window, it would be applied to the outside of the window NOT from the inside facing out) If you wish for your decal to be applied from the inside (not recommended) please specify that before it is made. There is no additional fee.

********************************************************
SIZE

All decal sizes are in Inches - see size menu for some options.

H (high) = up and down. W (wide) = left to right.

If you need a special size for any reason, please let us know before the decal is created. The price may increase slightly depending on the size increase.

**************************************************
COLORS

There is an attached color chart photo above for reference. Keep in mind the darker the color, the harder it will be to see the decal on a window or dark surfaces.

If you have any questions regarding this item or any others, please send a message before you purchase.

Your decal is normally created and shipped 1-2 days after purchase--Monday through Friday (except for holidays, custom orders and orders awaiting design approval).

We hope you enjoy our decals and designs. Thanks for looking!

**************ALL IMAGES ARE SUBJECT TO COPYRIGHT**************

Want more unique items? Check out our entire shop @
http://www.etsy.com/shop/CEWgraphicsNdesigns
